title: Workshop on Developing a Code of Ethics for Remote Education Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and experience in operating distance education
context.additional_context: Designed for pre-service/in-service language teachers, operating in digital device-supported settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of developing a remote education code of ethics using the Delphi technique.
Learners can apply 62 ethical items across six ethical dimensions (instructional design, social interaction, etc.).
Learners can propose solutions to ethical issues arising in online language education environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
